title: Funda.nl Scraper
description: Scrape real estate listings from Funda.nl. Provide a start URL or use location/property type filters.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Start scraping from a specific Funda.nl search URL. If provided, this will be used instead of location filter.

location.title: Location
location.description: City or area to search in (e.g., 'amsterdam', 'rotterdam'). Used if Start URL is not provided.

propertyType.title: Property Type
propertyType.description: Type of property to search for.

collectDetails.title: Collect property details
collectDetails.description: If enabled, scraper opens property detail pages for full information.

results_wanted.title: Maximum number of listings
results_wanted.description: The maximum number of property listings to collect.

max_pages.title: Maximum number of pages
max_pages.description: A safety cap on the number of search result pages to visit.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Use Apify Proxy for reliable scraping.
